articles.title: China surpasses U.S. as top destination for foreign investment - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Global foreign direct investment (FDI) collapsed in 2020, falling by 42% to an estimated $859B, from $1.5T in 2019.

articles.title: Merck shuts down COVID vaccine program following lackluster data - The Boston Globe
articles.description: The company is discontinuing development of its two experimental COVID-19 vaccines after early trial data showed they failed to generate immune responses comparable to a natural infection or existing vaccines.
